column5: Comfy, Peaceful neighborhood it's pretty quiet and very safe and close to major Restaurants , top brand stores and grocery stores. Readily Furnished apt. Microwave, Oversized Closets, Washer & Dryer in Unit,Computer Nooks, Tile Back Splash, Refrigerator, Crown Molding, Bookshelves, Wooden floor.
column8: FURNISHED LUXURY APT by GALLERIA AREA
